news.title: 前CNN主播莱蒙因反ICE抗议被捕，面临联邦指控
news.title0: Former CNN host Don Lemon faces charges after anti-ICE protest at Minnesota church
news.content: 前CNN主播唐·莱蒙因进入明尼苏达州一座教堂拍摄反移民执法抗议活动被捕，将面临“共谋剥夺权利”等联邦指控。
news.content0: Former CNN host Don Lemon has been arrested and will face federal charges after he entered a Minnesota church and filmed anti-immigration enforcement protesters as they disrupted a service.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 联合国秘书长警告：联合国面临“迫在眉睫的财政崩溃”
news.title0: UN risks 'imminent financial collapse', secretary general warns
news.content: 联合国秘书长古特雷斯警告，因成员国拖欠会费，联合国面临“迫在眉睫的财政崩溃”，资金可能在7月耗尽。
news.content0: The United Nations is at risk of "imminent financial collapse" due to member states not paying their fees, the body's head has warned.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 《小鬼当家》女星凯瑟琳·欧哈拉去世，享年71岁
news.title0: Schitt's Creek and Home Alone star Catherine O'Hara dies aged 71
news.content: 因出演《小鬼当家》和《富家穷路》而闻名的喜剧女演员凯瑟琳·欧哈拉在洛杉矶家中去世，享年71岁。
news.content0: Catherine O'Hara, the comedic actress best known for her starring roles in the Home Alone and Beetlejuice films, as well as her Emmy-winning turn in Schitt's Creek, has died aged 71.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普提名凯文·沃什为下一任美联储主席
news.title0: Trump picks Kevin Warsh to lead the US Federal Reserve
news.content: 美国总统特朗普提名前美联储理事凯文·沃什为下一任美联储主席，接替任期将满的杰罗姆·鲍威尔。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump has picked Kevin Warsh to lead the US Federal Reserve when current chairman Jerome Powell's four-year term ends in May.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 两岁男童在托儿所失踪，一小时后在沙箱内被找到
news.title0: Two-year-old found in grit bin after going missing at nursery
news.content: 英国爱丁堡一名两岁男童在托儿所失踪，一小时后被发现困在游乐场一个封闭的沙箱内，身体失温且血液盐分升高。
news.content0: A toddler who went missing at his nursery in Edinburgh was found inside a closed grit bin in the playground.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 布里斯班公布23亿澳元奥运主场馆设计，灵感源自民居
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主场馆设计，造价23亿澳元，灵感源自当地典型的“昆士兰”民居风格。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: iPhone 17销售强劲，缓解华尔街对苹果AI进展的担忧
news.title0: The iPhone 17 is easing Wall Street’s concerns about Apple’s AI troubles
news.content: 苹果公司最新财报显示，iPhone 17销售强劲，推动季度营收远超预期，缓解了市场对其在人工智能领域落后的担忧。
news.content0: As Big Techbattles for dominance in artificial intelligence, Apple is flying high on the success of the iPhone.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 叙利亚政府与库尔德武装达成协议，将合并军事力量
news.title0: Syrian Government and Kurdish-Led Militia Seal a Deal to Merge Forces
news.content: 叙利亚政府与库尔德武装“叙利亚民主军”达成全面协议，将把库尔德部队整合进叙利亚军队，以结束东北部冲突。
news.content0: Syria’s government and a powerful Kurdish-led militia reached a comprehensive agreement on Friday to integrate Kurdish forces into the Syrian military, according to Kurdish leaders and a Syrian official, the most decisive step yet to bringing calm afterclashes between the sideshad threatened to reignite a full-blown conflict in the country’s northeast.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 英国皇家邮政深陷困境，民众抱怨邮件投递严重延误
news.title0: A Challenge for Britain’s Royal Mail: Proving It Can Deliver the Mail
news.content: 英国皇家邮政近期因邮件投递严重延误而备受批评，民众抱怨其服务已大不如前，无法按时送达重要信件。
news.content0: Something seemed off about the cadence of Andy Shield’s mail.
news.author: NYTimes
